title: ‘Set up my Device’ process gets new Fast Pair UI when restoring your new Android
content:
To help streamline the process of restoring your new phone from an older Android device it seems the “Set up my Device” process has gained a Fast Pair UI.

more…

The post ‘Set up my Device’ process gets new Fast Pair UI when restoring your new Android appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: To streamline the process of restoring your new Android phone device the "Set up my Device" process has gained a Fast Pair-style UI.
